values: A mistake is something you do wrong.
My boss always yells at me when I make a mistake.

n.错误，误会，vi.误解，弄错，犯错，vt.弄错，误认
To mistake is to misunderstand or misinterpret something, often resulting in an error or incorrect action.
A mistake is an error or fault in action, judgment, or thought.
